General.Name: Sh Belling
General.Description: Shanghai Belling Co., Ltd. operates in IC industry in China. Its products include power management, power sensor, metal-oxide-semiconductorfield-effecttransisto, energy measurement, LCD display driver, power line communication modem IC, drivers, optical module systemonchip, digital isolator, electrically erasable programmable read-only memory, and analogtodigitalconverter, as well as analog switch, interface circuit, smoke detector, real time clock, and audio amplifier. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Mr. Chengjie  Zhou
2.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
